item.description:
www.trailofterror.com


Come one, come all to the "Scariest Haunt in New England".

Come visit us for our 17th season where we will continue to take you on a terrifying journey through over 30 very interactive scenes with over 60 of your favorite, and not so favorite characters awaiting you.

Even more scares, more special effects and more fun for the whole family.

This is a very unique, very scary haunted event.

The outrageous staff of the 'Trail' is made up entirely of volunteers. Proceeds to benefit the Trail of Terror foundation in order to provide financial aid in our surrounding communities.
 

NOTE: 7PM -8pm TIME SLOT ON OCT 9TH - This time slots will sell out...they always do ...so if you wait til the last minute you may not get in..

Ticket prices are $20 plus $2 processing fee.

We are doing the Speed Pass.. you get and print your ticket online.

Since the regular $10 tickets you wait in line for 4 hours... and that's just way too long..

Note:

Carpooling is the best option.. or just follow us up there.. as it can be a zoo and hard to find people....
item.name: Trail of Terror
